snippet.title: BREAKING: Driver trapped in highway crash
snippet.content:
UPDATE 3.48pm: Two utes have collided on the Bruce Hwy at Bakers Creek with one driver still trapped in the car.
Two QFES crews are attempting to free the man, with two ambulance crews on standby.
The Bruce Hwy remains open despite the serious crash on the intersection of the Bruce Hwy and Gorman St.
Emergency crews have been at the scene since 3.15pm.
INITIAL: A DRIVER involved in a two-vehicle crash at Baker Creek is believed to be trapped.
Crash on Bruce HwyContributed
The crash happened about 3.15pm, and paramedics and QFES crews were called after reports one of the cars had run into a fence and the driver was trapped.
According to a QAS spokeswoman, the crash happened on the Bruce Hwy at the intersection of Gorman St.
